entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy and 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
